title: El Glitch
visual_core: A digital angel fragmenting into colorful static noise and pixel dust.

title: El Cortafuegos
visual_core: A glowing hexagonal energy shield blocking aggressive red data projectiles.

title: La Singularidad
visual_core: A black hole formed by circuit boards absorbing light and time.

title: El Codigo Fuente
visual_core: An ancient holographic scroll floating in a void, displaying glowing binary gold text.

title: La Latencia
visual_core: A hourglass where the sand floats upwards, defying gravity, made of neon particles.

title: El Nodo
visual_core: A glowing network hub connecting thousands of fiber optic threads.

title: El Encriptador
visual_core: A hooded cyberpunk monk holding a key made of pure laser light.

title: La Actualizacion
visual_core: A mechanical butterfly emerging from a rusted metal cocoon.

title: El Bucle Infinito
visual_core: A robotic snake eating its own tail (Ouroboros) in a perfect green neon circle.

title: La CPU
visual_core: A realistic human heart made entirely of gold processors and pulsating wires.

title: El Error 404
visual_core: A majestic door standing open in a white void, leading to absolutely nothing.

title: El Algoritmo
visual_core: A giant holographic wheel of fortune floating over a futuristic cyberpunk city.

title: El Hacker
visual_core: A figure manipulating floating virtual reality cubes with glowing hands.

title: La Nube
visual_core: A castle made of clouds and data streams floating in a digital sky.

title: El Bot
visual_core: A sleek, porcelain-faced android looking curiously at a small organic flower.
